originalText.text: I bought four HVAC heat pump units for my appointment a few years ago. One of the units was defective and the company only wanted to send a repairman in this new unit. Only at the insistence of my super ( who had referred almost all the shareholders use them for purchasing and installing new units) , did they replace the units,

Only at the insistence of my super ( who had referred almost all the shareholders use them for purchasing and installing new units) , did they replace the units,

originalText.text:
DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!!!

I have never written a review but I felt the need to make sure to warn others about how horrible my experience was with this company. SAVE YOUR MONEY! Firstly, they were extremely unresponsive, took my credit card information, and forgot to book my appointment 3 times despite discussing a date and time they would need to come. After unnecessary back and forth for a month, they finally sent someone to repair the A/C. No surprise, they were supposed to come at 11am and they showed up at 1:45pm. Not only were they late, but they also only "repaired" one of the units despite requesting all the units in the apartment. Their excuse.... "we have 4 other apartments to do and don't have enough time".  The one ac they claimed to "repair", started back making noise 20 minutes after they left which was not only a waste of my time but my money as well.

When I reached out to the company to follow up on the problem still existing, I was told I would be called back to discuss a refund. As expected, radio silence for a week. I was forced to call YET AGAIN in which an extremely rude man refused to refund me and wanted to charge me MORE money to send more of their staff to "fix the problem". When I politely said I would prefer to take my money somewhere else and get the refund as I was disappointed in the service, he cut me off and HUNG UP ON ME.  They are extremely rude, unresponsive, and overall don't care for their customers.

TERRIBLE SERVICE
TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
TERRIBLE TIME MANAGEMENT

originalText.text: Feeling like I’ve been scammed and these people are super rude! Paid a few hundred dollars to have my heaters diagnose. Then was told it would cost $400 to replace a part. I paid but then the next day was told “sorry wrong one, it actually costs $800.” I was shocked. I expressed my concern that price was too different and would like to know exactly the info of the parts but was refused and got hung up on. Do not use this company. They don’t really care to help their customers, they only care about making money off of you.

originalText.text: I reached out to replace a very old ptac unit in my building (from 93'). Figlia & Sons, Inc. was very fast and clear with communication. They provided COI unprompted. After delivery and installation, there was a buzzing/clicking sound that I wasn't happy with. Within a few days, they sent representatives to fix the issue. Issue is resolved, and I can now control my ptac with the SimonAire app

originalText.text: I had a great experience with Figlia. Last spring they did affordable, easy to schedule, and comprehensive cleanings of my thru the wall units. Recently I had them help me with a unit repair. They diagnosed a compressor issue. They tried to work with the manufacturer to get the warrantied part replaced, but my original installer refused to provide the paperwork needed to take advantage of the warranty. Sylvia was great throughout the whole process, including helping me arrange to get the unit over to the original installer so they could do the compressor repair. I will always use Figlia for my HVAC needs.
